Name: Living Steel
Description:
The target's Melee Attacks gains +1 to hit and Magical Attacks .
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Corruption of Tin
Description: The target suffers -1 Arm and gains Metal Armour.

Name: Wall of Lead
Description:
Place a Wall with dimensions 1√ó6" anywhere on the target.
Remove the Terrain Feature when the spell ends.

Name: Molten Copper
Description: The target suffers D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks,Zeal(against Metal Armour). These hits always wound on 4+.

Name: Word of Iron
Description: The target gains +2 Arm and  Metal Armour.

Name: Quicksilver Lash
Description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks,Zeal(against Metal Armour). These hits always wound on 4+.

The target's Melee Attacks to-wound rolls are modified by [ùõº] and gain Magical Attacks.

Name: Thunder and Lightning
Description:
=1pt All hits are resolved with Str 6, AP 2, Lightning Attacks, Magical Attacks. The target suffers 3 hits. Before removing casulties, apply [ùõº]
[ùõº]: The target suffers 1 additional hit
[ùõΩ]: Select a new Unengaged enemy unit within 6" of the target: it suffers 2 hits. Before removing casualties, select a 3rd Unengaged enemy unit within 6" of the 2nd unit: it suffers 1 hit.

Name: Foresight
Description:
The target gains +2 Def and +2 Off.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Chance of Redemption
Description:
The target gains Divine Attacks.
In addition, it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move.

Name: The Stars Align
Description: The target's Melee Attacks must reroll failed to-hit rolls.

Name: Fate's Judgement
Description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 1 and Magical Attacks. These hits are set to wound on 6+, and gain +1 to wound for each friendly Player Turn before the current one. E.g. in your fourth Magic Phase, it wounds on 3+.

Name: Augury of Despair
Description: The target suffers -1 Off and -1 Agi, both to a minimum of 1..

Name: Inescapable Doom
Description:
Immediately when the spell is cast and at the start of each of the Caster's subsequent Magic Phases, the target suffers 1 hit that wounds automatically with AP 10 and Magical Attacks.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Fountain of Youth
Description:
Choose one of the following effects for the target:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises 1 HP.
  • One Attachable Model in the target Recovers 1 HP.
No Health Pool can Raise or Recover more than 1 HP per Magic Phase from this spell.

Name: Entwining Roots
Description:
The target suffers -2" Cha and -2" Mob, both to a minimum of 2".
In addition the target suffers -2 Agi, to a minimum of 1.

Name: Veil of Mist
Description: All units within 12" of the target when Casting or Shooting suffer - 1 to hit with Shooting Attacks and a - 1 modifier to their Casting Rolls.

Name: Gravel Storm
Description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with Str 3, AP 1, and Magical Attacks. If the target contains a Rank-and-File model with Light Troops, these hits are instead resolved with Str 4, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Stone Skin
Description: The target gains +1 Res. In addition, Melee Attacks allocated towards it never wound on better than 4+.

Name: Quicksand
Description: The target suffers -1 to-hit with its Melee Attacks. The first time in each Player Turn that it performs a Move (see Definitions and Terminology Chapter), each of its Health Pools must take a Dangerous Terrain(6+) Test.

Name: Whispers of the Veil
Description:
The target suffers -1 Res.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Danse Macabre
Description: The target gains Dying Blow, Ghost Step. In addition, it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move.

Name: Chorus of the Damned
Description: The target gains Distracting(1), Horror.

Name: Touch of the Reaper
Description: The target suffers D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks, Psychic Attacks.

Name: Spectral Blades
Description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target are always at least Str 4, and always at least AP 4, and gain Magical Attacks.

Name: Soul Blight
Description: The target suffer 2D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks, Psychic Attacks.

Name: The Devouring Dark
Description: The target suffers a hit with Area Attack(2√ó2), Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Hand of Glory
Description:
The target gains Aegis(6+) and Aegis(+1, max. 3+).

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Blood Curse
Description:
The target suffers -1 Str and -1 AP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Pentagram of Pain
Description:
The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
If one or more unsaved wounds are caused by this spell, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Umbral Majesty
Description:
Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Grind Attack(5, Str 5, AP 2, Unmodifiable).

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: The Grave Calls
Description:
The target suffers 8 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

Name: Fireball
Description:
The target suffers 2D3+1 
	hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks,
.

Name: Flaming Swords
Description: The target gains +1 to wound, Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting), Flaming Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

Name: Dragon's Roar
Description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks,Magical Attacks) and Grind Attack(2D6, Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks and Unmodifiable).

Name: Pyroclastic Flow
Description:
The target suffers 5D3 
	hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks,
.

Name: Pillars of Fire
Description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target hit automatically, are always Str 4, are always AP 0, and gain Flaming Attacks,Magical Attacks.

Name: Cage of Embers
Description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, .
After the initial hits the target gains Weakness(Flaming Attacks). In addition, whenever the target moves (see Definitions and Terminology chapter), it suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, .

Name: Predator's Instinct
Description:
The target gains +2" Cha and Resistance(Ranged Attacks).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Savage Fury
Description: The target gains Fury,Fearless,Unruly,Frenzy. In addition, the target can never be wounded on better than 3+.

Name: Awaken the Beast
Description: The target gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

Name: Swarm of Insects
Description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 5D6 hits with AP 0 and Magical Attacks. These hits always wound on 6+.
In addition, it suffers -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

Name: Wild Spikes
Description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Grind Attack(4, Str 6, AP 3, Unmodifiable)

Name: Totemic Summon
Description: Summon a Totemic Beast (profile below).

Name: Smite the Unbeliever
Description:
The target suffers D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
‚ú†: These hits are instead resolved with Str 7, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
√ó: These hits are instead resolved with Str 3, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Light of Faith
Description:
The target counts as having one fewer Proper Ranks when Engaged.
‚ú†: Two fewer Proper Ranks instead
√ó: Spell has no effect

Name: Weight of Judgement
Description:
The target suffers -2 Agi, to a minimum of 1.
‚ú†: -3 Agi instead
√ó: -1 Agi instead

Name: Holy Affliction
Description:
The target suffers -1 to wound.
‚ú†: The target suffers -1 AP.
√ó: The target gains +1 AP.

Name: Wrath of God
Description:
Place a marker on the target point. You must roll for Divine Intervention at the start of each subsequent Magic Phase:
‚ú†: Each unit within 2D6" of the centre of the marker suffers 2D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. Then remove the marker.
√ó: The opponent may move the marker up to 3" in any direction.

Name: Rain of Fire
Description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits. All other units within 3" of the target suffer 1 hit.
All hits are resolved with Str 9, AP 4, Magical Attacks,Flaming Attacks,.
‚ú†: Increase the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.
√ó: Decrease the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.

Name: Evil Eye
Description:
The target suffers -1 Cha and -1 Mob, both to a minimum of 3, and -1 Agi, to a minimum of 1 .

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Soured Luck
Description: Melee Attacks against the target are set to hit on at least 3+ .

Name: Illusory Paths
Description:
Choose which effect to apply when casting the spell:
  • The target gains Random Movement(2D6").
  • The target gains Random Movement(3D6").

Name: Cauldron's Curse
Description: The target gains Weakness(Ranged Attacks).

Name: Clouded Sight
Description: The target cannot draw Line of Sight to a target more than 12" away from it.

Name: Mists of Invisibility
Description:
Mark the point under the centre of the target. Remove the target from the Battlefield. Place it back using Ambush (within 12‚Ä≥ of the marked point) at the start of the next friendly Movement Phase.
*Cannot target Shaken units

Name: The Dead Arise
Description: Summon a Skeletons or Zombies unit. Declare which when selecting the target for the spell. The unit has a number of Health Points corresponding to the Rsr value of the unit. All models must be placed within the spell‚Äôs Range, with at least one model touching the target point.

Name: Echoes of the Dark Forest
Description: The target gains Fearless. In addition, it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules, instead of performing a Magical Move.

Name: Black Wing Totem
Description: The target gains  +2" Cha and +3 Agi.

Name: Blooded Horn Totem
Description: The target gains +1 Att and +2 AP.

Name: Clouded Eye Totem
Description: The target gains Hard Target(1) and Magic Resistance(3).

Name: Gnarled Hide Totem
Description: The target gains +1 Arm and Distracting(1).

Name: Rune of Revocation
Description: Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn. The target unit gains Magic Resistance(2), which is also applied to friendly spells.

Name: Rune of Reckoning
Description: Friendly models in the target unit gain Hatred(Melee). Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Hatred.

Name: Rune of Oaths
Description: Friendly models in the target unit gain Zeal(Melee). Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Zeal.

Name: Rune of Resolve
Description:
The target gains Swiftstride, and until the end of the Player Turn it also gains Light Troops.
In addition, the target may perform a 4" Magical Move

Name: Rune of Gleaming
Description: The target gains Distracting(1),Hard Target(1).

Name: Rune of Resilience
Description: To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

Name: Frostbite
Description: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Armour. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers H Armour. {This spell may target two units instead of one (declare the additional target before the Casting Attempt).}

Name: Astral Union
Description: The target gains Regeneration(6+) and Regeneration(+1, max. 3+).

Name: Arise!
Description:
Choose one of the following effects, for each target:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.
  • One Attachable Model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.
The following models cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase:
  • Height 4--5 models with Solitary
  • Attachable Models

Name: Hellfire
Description:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 6, Armour Penetration 0, and Magical Attacks.

*This spell can target units Engaged in Combat and in contact with the Caster's Front Facing.

Name: Guile and Fury
Description:
Can be cast in one of two versions: Augment: Cannot be cast by a Goblin. The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are increased by 1".

Hex: Cannot be cast by an Orc. The target suffers H to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1".

Name: Forest Embrace
Description:
Place a Forest* underneath the target. This Forest always extends to the edges of the target's Unit Boundary (even if the unit moves or changes formation).

* You may place a marker next to the unit instead

Name: Chains of Pride
Description: The target gains Unstable and Fearless. {Targets with Supernal cannot take Break Tests.}

Name: Tempest of the Storm Witch
Description: The target may immediately perform a 12" Magical Move and loses Scoring. {In addition, the target gains Coastal Predator.}

Name: Spear of Infinity
Description:
The target suffers 1 hit with Strength 2 [5], Armour Penetration 2, Area Attack(1√ó5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)].
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Strength for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

Name: Curse of the Phantom Queen
Description:
Attacks made by the target suffer H AP.
Attacks made against the target gain +1 AP.
Attacks from spells are not affected.

Name: Favour of Meladys
Description:
=1pt The target gains 2 Protection Tokens which are removed when the spell ends. When a friendly unit within 18" of the target suffers a wound, after Armour Saves have been taken, before any Special Saves are taken, the target may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:
  • Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token, provided they are suffered simultaneously.
  • Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per Phase.
  • Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

Name: Curse of Nezibkesh
Description: The target gains Incendiary. In addition, the target suffers H Def and H Off, and an additional H Def and H Off, as long as it has 1 or more Incendiary Markers on it.

Name: Breath of the Lady
Description: Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your Blessing Token pool.

Name: Breath of the Steppe
Description:
Place a round Tornado Marker with a 3" diameter with its centre on the target point. The Tornado Marker must be placed more than 1" away from any unit. The marker is considered Covering Terrain for units inside and/or behind them that contributes to ‚ü®Soft‚ü© {Hard} Cover.
The Tornado Marker is Dangerous Terrain (‚ü®2‚ü© {3}), even for models with Strider.

Name: Children of Umi
Description: All Melee Attacks allocated against the target suffer H to wound.

Name: Duty is Eternal
Description: The target gains +1 Res.

Name: Iovanis' Thunder
Description: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks,Magical Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll).

Name: Echoes of the Dark Forest
Description: The target gains Fearless. The target may perform a 4 5‚Ä≥ Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules.

Name: Brace for Impact!
Description: The target gains Fight in Extra Rank

Name: On The Double!
Description: The target gains +1‚Ä≥ Advance Rate and +4‚Ä≥ March Rate

Name: Ready! Aim! Fire!
Description: The target gains Accurate

Name: Steady, Men!
Description: Discipline Tests taken by the target are subject to MinimisedRoll. A unit that receives this Order and passes a Rally Test doesn't become Shaken, and the Reform that is made after Rallying doesn't prevent the unit from moving and/or shooting (but it still counts as having moved for shooting purposes).

Name: Ullor's Blessing
Description: The target gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks).

Name: Sunna's Blessing
Description: The target gains Flaming Attacks. All enemy units in base contact with one or more targets of this spell when the spell is cast suffer D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Volund's Blessing
Description: The target's failed to-wound rolls with Melee Attacks must be rerolled.

Name: Orison of Shielding
Description: The target gains Aegis (5+).

Name: Orison of Striking
Description: The target gains +2 Off, Magical Attacks, and ignore Parry. Model parts with Mount are not affected.

Name: Orison of Discipline
Description: The target's Discipline is set to 9.
